trans-unit.source: Represents an individual row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示单个行中的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The GridViewRow class is used represent an individual row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 GridViewRow 类表示单个行中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Each row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has a designated row type using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 中的每一行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件具有指定的行类型使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>枚举。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different row types.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出不同的行类型。

trans-unit.source: |Row type|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |`DataRow`|A data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |`EmptyDataRow`|The empty row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: |行类型 |说明 | |--------------|-----------------| |`DataRow`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中的数据行。 | |`EmptyDataRow`|中的空行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The empty row is displayed when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has no records to display and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> template is not `null`.| |`Footer`|The footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |`Header`|The header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |`Pager`|A pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |`Separator`|A separator row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| To determine the row type of a GridViewRow object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 空的行时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件具有没有要显示的记录和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>模板不显示`null`。 | |`Footer`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中的页脚行。 | |`Header`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中的标题行。 | |`Pager`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中的页导航行。 | |`Separator`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中的一个分隔符行。 | 若要确定 GridViewRow 对象的行类型，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: A GridViewRow object also has a state associated with it.
trans-unit.target: GridViewRow 对象也有与之关联的状态。

trans-unit.source: The state can be a bitwise combination of the values in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 状态可以是以下表中的值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: |State value|Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |`Alternate`|The GridViewRow object is an alternate row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |`Edit`|The GridViewRow object is in edit mode.| |`Normal`|The GridViewRow object is in its normal (default) state.| |`Selected`|The GridViewRow object is selected.| To determine the state of a GridViewRow object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: |状态值 |说明 | |-----------------|-----------------| |`Alternate`|GridViewRow 对象是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中的交替行。 | |`Edit`|GridViewRow 对象处于编辑模式。 | |`Normal`|GridViewRow 对象处于正常 （默认） 状态。 | |`Selected`|选择 GridViewRow 对象。 | 若要确定 GridViewRow 对象的状态，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowState%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control stores all of its data rows in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件将存储它的所有数据行中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of a GridViewRow object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定 GridViewRow 对象中的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>集合，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowIndex%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can access the properties of the underlying data object that is bound to the GridViewRow object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以访问通过使用绑定到 GridViewRow 对象的基础数据对象属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem%2A> property is available only during and after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem%2A>属性均可用，仅期间和之后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of the data object in the underlying data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItemIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定基础数据源中的数据对象的索引，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItemIndex%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItemIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can access the individual cells of the GridViewRow object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过使用访问 GridViewRow 对象的各个单元格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a cell contains other controls, you can retrieve a control from the cell by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个单元格包含其他控件，你可以通过使用，从单元格检索控件<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>单元格的集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the cell to find the control, if the control has an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> specified.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法的单元格来查找该控件中，如果控件具有<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>指定。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a field value from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> field column or an automatically generated field column, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A> property of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索的字段值从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>字段列或自动生成的字段列中，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A>单元格的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a field value from other field column types where the field value is bound to a control, first retrieve the control from the appropriate cell and then access the appropriate property of the control.
trans-unit.target: 要从其他字段列类型，其中的字段值绑定到控件中检索字段值，请首先从相应的单元格检索控件，然后访问控件的相应属性。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is possible to use a data-binding expression directly in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> field column without binding the value to a property of a control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 可以使用数据绑定表达式中直接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>字段列，而无需将值绑定到控件的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the field value is automatically placed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl> control.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，字段值将自动放入<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the field value, you must first retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl> control from the appropriate cell and then use its <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索的字段值，必须首先检索<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>控制从相应的单元格，然后使用其<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of GridViewRow, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: GridViewRow 实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItemIndex%2A>|The value of the `dataItemIndex` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowIndex%2A>|The value of the `rowIndex` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowState%2A>|The value of the `rowState` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>|The value of the `rowType` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |初始值 | |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItemIndex%2A>|值`dataItemIndex`参数。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowIndex%2A>|值`rowIndex`参数。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowState%2A>|值`rowState`参数。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>|值`rowType`参数。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItemIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows*> collection of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref>对象在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows*>集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows*>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem*> in the underlying <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem*>中基础<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 按位组合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying data object to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object is bound.
trans-unit.target: 获取与的基础数据对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref>对象都绑定。

trans-unit.source: Use the DataItem property to access the properties of the underlying data object to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object is bound.
trans-unit.target: DataItem 属性用于访问与的基础数据对象的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>对象都绑定。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: The DataItem property is only available during and after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: DataItem 属性才可用，期间和之后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property applies only to data rows.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性仅适用于数据行。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the underlying data object to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object is bound.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>向其表示基础数据对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref>对象都绑定。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem*> in the underlying <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem*>中基础<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem*>

trans-unit.source: Use the DataItemIndex property to determine the index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem%2A> in the underlying <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: 使用 DataItemIndex 属性来确定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem%2A>在基础<xref:System.Data.DataSet>。</xref:System.Data.DataSet></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem%2A>索引

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property applies only to data rows.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性仅适用于数据行。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem*> in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem*>基础数据源中。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.DataItem*>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether to pass an event up the page's ASP.NET server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否将事件沿页的 ASP.NET 服务器控件层次结构向上传递。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件源。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据的对象。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果事件已被取消;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows*> collection of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref>对象在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows*>集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows*>

trans-unit.source: Use the RowIndex property to determine the index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: RowIndex 属性用于确定的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>对象在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property applies only to data rows.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性仅适用于数据行。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows*> collection of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref>对象在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows*>集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取的状态<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A> property to determine the state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>属性来确定的状态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The state can be a bitwise combination of the values in the following table: |Status value|Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`DataControlRowState.Alternate`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object is an alternate row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |`DataControlRowState.Edit`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object is in edit mode.| |`DataControlRowState.Normal`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object is in its normal (default) state.| |`DataControlRowState.Selected`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object is selected.| This property is commonly used to determine the state of a row before performing an operation.
trans-unit.target: 状态可以是以下表中的值的按位组合: |状态值 |说明 | |------------------|-----------------| |`DataControlRowState.Alternate`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>对象是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中的交替行。 | |`DataControlRowState.Edit`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>对象处于编辑模式。 | |`DataControlRowState.Normal`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>对象处于正常 （默认） 状态。 | |`DataControlRowState.Selected`|选择<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>对象。 | 此属性通常用于执行操作之前，确定行的状态。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 按位组合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the row type of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取的行类型<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the RowType property to determine the type of row that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object represents.
trans-unit.target: 使用 RowType 属性，以确定的一种行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>对象所表示。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different row type values using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了使用不同的行类型值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>枚举。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>

trans-unit.source: |Row type|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|A data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|The footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|The header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|The empty row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: |行类型 |说明 | |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中的数据行。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中的页脚行。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中的标题行。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|中的空行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>

trans-unit.source: The empty row is displayed when <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control does not have any records to display.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|A pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|A separator row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.| This property is commonly used to determine a row's type before performing an operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件不具有任何要显示的记录时，是否显示空的行。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中的页导航行。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中的一个分隔符行。 | 此属性通常用于在执行操作之前确定某一行的类型。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref>值。
